MAPPING.DESCRIPTION: Truncate, then load Period Summary information for ALL Open periods.
MAPPING.NAME: m_TruncLoad_RCIT_OPN_PRD_SUMM

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: Summarize claims for ALL Open periods, per table definition. The query uses VRCIT_MODEL_PRD_STUS to find ALL Open periods for selecting claims.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: SQ_Open_Period_Claims

TRANSFORMFIELD.DESCRIPTION: The descriptions for these values are in VRAP.TVNDR_REBT_CD WHERE TYP_CD = 65.
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: BTCH_STAT_CD

TRANSFORMFIELD.DESCRIPTION: The descriptions for these values are in VRAP.TVNDR_REBT_CD WHERE TYP_CD = 85.
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: CLM_SRC_CD

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: User Defined Join
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE:
-- join conditions
vrap.RCIT_BASE_CLM_INV.INV_ELIG_DT = vrap.VRCIT_MODEL_PRD_STUS.MNTH_PERIOD_END_DT AND vrap.RCIT_BASE_CLM_INV.MODEL_TYP_CD = vrap.VRCIT_MODEL_PRD_STUS.MODEL_TYP_CD AND vrap.RCIT_BASE_CLM_INV.BTCH_GID = vrap.RCIT_CLM_BTCH_CNTL.BTCH_GID

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Source Filter
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE:
-- filter condition
vrap.VRCIT_MODEL_PRD_STUS.CLM_LOCK_CD IN ('A','O') AND vrap.VRCIT_MODEL_PRD_STUS.APC_STAT_CD IN ('O')

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: Summarize claims for ALL Open periods, per table definition. The query uses VRCIT_MODEL_PRD_STUS to find ALL Open periods for selecting claims.
INSTANCE.NAME: SQ_Open_Period_Claims

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: Summarizes claims into Period Summary format. Used by BOTH Open and Closed Period Summaries.
INSTANCE.NAME: mplt_Build_PRD_SUMM

SHORTCUT.COMMENTS: Summarizes claims into Period Summary format. Used by BOTH Open and Closed Period Summaries.
SHORTCUT.NAME: mplt_Build_PRD_SUMM

SHORTCUT.COMMENTS: This table reports Open period BCI claims. The DSPN_DT is included in the grouping results. The results show how many claims at the grouping level had single or multiple exceptions, and how many had a dispense date from the previous calendar quarter.
SHORTCUT.NAME: RCIT_OPN_PRD_SUMM
